title: GET_AMMO_IN_PED_WEAPON
content:
0x015A522136D7F9510x0C755733// GetAmmoInPedWeapon
int GET_AMMO_IN_PED_WEAPON(Ped ped, Hash weaponhash);WEAPON::GET_AMMO_IN_PED_WEAPON(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), a_0)  
From decompiled scripts  
Returns total ammo in weapon  
GTALua Example :  
natives.WEAPON.GET_AMMO_IN_PED_WEAPON(plyPed, WeaponHash)

// GetAmmoInPedWeapon

WEAPON::GET_AMMO_IN_PED_WEAPON(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), a_0)

Returns total ammo in weapon
